thumb.title: ファイアーエムブレム覚醒ルーナティックモード0成长率最短攻略94ターン
thumb.description: 英語のルール:1. Classic Mode. 2. All Renown awards are allowed (the game is not possible to complete without). 3. DLC is banned. 4. Skirmishes are banned. 5. Logbook units are banned. 6. Bonus box items and Anna shops are banned. 7. No sparking tiles if possible, but sometimes it cannot be avoided. In that case, any item received from one will be discarded. 8. All maps, including Paralogues, cost turns. All characters are optional (I don't have enough cash to make forges for Tiki's chapter).
